content: and pull up a loop 4 loops on hook complete the stitch by the completed stitch will continue working around working 1tr in the left-hand look like this don t worry the edge and slip_stitch to join do corner space repeat this that it dips down this will not cut the yarn joining process at every square up later point where two squares join even those that are already joined with a slip_stitch round 2 rsd turn so the right side is facing down slip_stitch into next space 2ch 2tr in same space 3tr in each space around at the corners 3tr 2ch 3tr when you have worked all the way around join with a slip_stitch into top of 2ch do not cut yarn from now on i will refer to these plain granny rounds as granny round round 3 rsu work 1 granny round round 4 rsd work 1 granny round round 5 rsu work 1 granny round join with a slip_stitch and fasten_off cut yarn © anita gibney 2015/2024 madebyanita co uk all rights reserved please do not copy sell share or otherwise distribute this pattern 14 grace round 6 rsd join colour b in any space between 3tr 2ch 1tr 1ch in same space now work 2tr 1ch in each space around at the corners work 2tr 3ch 2tr 1ch when you have worked all the way around ending with a 1ch join with a slip_stitch into top of 2ch and fasten_off cut yarn round 7 rsu join colour a in any chain space work 1 granny round round 8 rsd work 1 granny round round 9 rsu work 1 granny round round 10 rsd work 1 granny round round 11 rsu work 1 granny round join with a slip_stitch and fasten_off cut yarn these pictures show the pattern worked to the end of round 11 pink version to round 8 you should find that is now laying flat and should be completely square without the need for blocking this section of the pattern can be used on its own to make a baby blanket this size and shape can be adjusted by using a different number/ configuration of starbursts in the middle 7 x 9 squares is a popular size for a baby blanket mini grannies round 12 rsu before starting to join your grannies check you have the correct number of 3tr clusters there should be 39 x 3tr clusters on each side this round consists of 76 x 2 round granny squares and 4 special squares that will be joined in the shaded areas of the chart these are actually rectangles and compensate for the fact that there are an odd number of clusters in this round it is not possible to have an even number of clusters in this round start joining at one corner any corner of the blanket it doesn t matter and work around in a clockwise direction © anita gibney 2015/2024 madebyanita co uk all rights
